title: in game FPS drop and Ping higher than my out of game ping and fps
body:
Anyone dealing with this since 7.1? I've tried everything, repair files, fresh install, update drivers, bios, firewall, no new programs since then. My ping out of game is 10, in game 60. which isnt a big deal but obviously id like it to be better. The fps is where its weird. when the game starts as i sit in fountain not moving it stay at 115-160. as soon as my champ moves it drops to 75-85, then once minions or more champs are on my screen it drops so low i'll freeze momentarilly sometimes. Like 10-40 fps. If anyone has any suggestions Im All EARS!! :) 
PS already tried the suggested from riot support page{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
Hmmmmmm it seems like your client is slowly having a hard time dealing with all the game assets being used, and as time goes by more assets are needed so it keeps slowing down throughout the match. 

Sounds like you've hit just about all the steps in our [**FPS Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)), so let's go ahead and have you get some more in-depth help from our tech guys. Hit them up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to smooth out those frames!
